jobDescription: Location - Los Angeles  Duration - 6 months  Start Date - ASAP  Data Engineer - Ad Products - Entertainment Powerhouse  Job Description:  The Ad Product Data Engineer will help maintain database and reporting solutions which distill complex data sets into readily accessible interfaces for senior executives. This person possesses an in-depth understanding of databases, analytics systems and data sets. The role includes working on Enterprise Data Warehouse projects where multiple data sets are aggregated and then analyzed. Responsibilities:  1. Manage existing databases, logic, and reporting systems built in Access and Excel and help migrate to long term automated systems built in Spark.  2. Work with multiple data sets: Adobe Analytics, FreeWheel, DFP, Hulu, Rentrak, comScore, Nielsen and answer complex questions about video consumption on all digital platforms  3. Create technical documentation  Qualifications:  · Advanced knowledge of SQL and Visual Basic  · Advanced Excel formula experience  · Advanced Access Database experience  · Experience working with HDFS, S3, Redshift, and Elastic MapReduce are preferred  · Qlikview, Tableau, Adobe Analytics, FreeWheel, DFP experience preferred.  · Computer Science degree (or similar) a plus  · Experience in advertising industry or Media and Entertainment preferred  · Excellent communication skills
